text: The University of Pretoria is a large public research university in Pretoria, the capital of South Africa. It opened in 1908. The University was built on seven suburban campuses (in parts of Pretoria). It is organised into nine faculties and a business school. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website Category:1908 establishments Category:1900s establishments in Africa Category:20th-century establishments in South Africa Pretoria Category:Pretoria
title: University of Pretoria
